docs.title: Hard Stops
docs.description: Actions requiring human approval - DO NOT BYPASS

customCommands.name: governance
customCommands.prompt: Review the governance authority for this task. Read in order: 1) constitution/constitution.md, 2) contracts/agents.md, 3) contracts/hard-stops.md, 4) contracts/invariants.md, 5) requirements/workflow/spec.md, 6) docs/adr/. What governance rules apply? Are there hard stops? What ADRs are needed?

customCommands.name: ci-gates
customCommands.prompt: Check if my changes will pass the CI gates. Run: ./scripts/run-all-gates.sh "PR title" "PR description". The gates that MUST pass are: no-invariant-drift.sh, require-adr-on-canonical-changes.sh, adr-must-be-linked-from-spec.sh, and gitleaks security scanning. Help me understand potential issues.

customCommands.name: security
customCommands.prompt: Scan for secrets using gitleaks. Run: gitleaks detect --source . --verbose --config .gitleaks.toml. Help me identify any potential security issues in my changes before committing.
